title: 9-12-16 Michelle Jensen, Mary Abreu, and Kathy Doughty join Pat Sloan on American Patchwork and Quilting Radio
description:
Michelle Jensen is back to talk creating with a story and creating with Scrap! Both are things we quilters love to do. Do you love the seasons? Michelle will explain how she creates her signature seasonal banners.. then we talk some scrap magic and ways to think about using those up! www.instagram.com/MixiHeart/ 
----------------
Mary Abreu is back to talk making gifts!!  What's hot, what to do with Panels... want to try a tuffet but not ready for the main thing yet? She has all the details! 
www.instagram.com/thatcraftaddict/
-----------------
Kathy Doughty of Material Obsessions uses color and pattern in exciting ways. From the fabrics she buys for her shop in Australia, to the quilts she makes, her ability to mix elements is exciting! We talk about her latest book, fabrics and teaching a the Sisters show.
www.materialobsession.typepad.com/
-------------------
visit American Patchwork & Quilting at http://allpeoplequilt.com
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/apqmagazine
Visit host Pat Sloan at http://www.patsloan.com

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
